Address.label: Address
Address.value: 300 CONTINENTAL DRIVE, NEWARK, Delaware, 19713, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: SLM Corp is the largest student lender in the country. It makes and holds student loans through the guaranteed Federal Family Education Loan Program as well as through private channels. It also engages in debt-management operations, including accounts receivable and collections services, and runs college savings programs.

value.name: Kerri A. Palmer
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
